long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display a chart showing all tracks by an artist on Spotify sortable by various fields including play count.


Just click on the extension icon when on the page for an artist on the Spotify website and a new tab will open showing the chart.

Update June 2023: Track naming and deduping has been hugely improved :)
Request new features at https://github.com/tommy-russoniello/spotify-artist-chart/issues
